title: Manchester City's Walker faces lockdown breach investigation
description: Kyle Walker faces disciplinary action from Manchester City after reportedly breaking lockdown rules by hosting a party involving two sex workers.
content:
Kyle Walker joined Manchester City from Tottenham in July 2017
Kyle Walker faces disciplinary action from Manchester City after reportedly breaking lockdown rules by hosting a party involving two sex workers.
Walker, 29, has apologised and urged people to "… [+2518 chars]
